import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FashionsService } from 'src/app/services/fashions.service'; import { Tag } from 'src/app/shared/model/Tag'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tag', templateUrl: './tag.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tag.component.css'] }) export class TagComponent implements OnInit{ tags?:Tag[]; constructor(api:FashionsService){ this.tags = api.getAllTags(); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
